_comment: Created by ianb on 08/10/2013 13:52:33 using v0.9
title: How many patients are affected by delayed transfers by the type of care received?
analysis_commentary: The overall number of patients experiencing a delayed transfer of care appears to have decreased over time. However, this appears to be mainly driven by improvements in the number of patients being effectively discharged from non-acute care.
data_source: NHS England, Delayed transfer of care
